name: CROK-IN-GOAL
description:
CROKE-IN-GOAL is a new variation on the dexterity game Crokinole.  Presented as a mini zine, this game ask you to think of your discs as football players, sending them careening across the board to force neutral pieces into opposing territory. 

Reminiscent of air hockey and paper football, this version of crokinole is great for children who just want to see the discs ricocheting around the board. 

For a fun twist, consider playing the game in real time rather than in alternating turns! This will add to the frenzied tug of war to control the scoring discs!
